title: 请求帮忙下载DayM2.3.3版本。已经更新了
author: QYER灬小白
txt_content:
http://www.planetminecraft.com/mod/daym-212---the-ultimate-zombie-apocalypse-mod-3d-guns-zombies-and-much-more-inspired-by-dayz/
现在DayM模组更新到2.3.3了，但是不能翻墙，你懂得，所以，请求翻墙帮忙下载一下，然后放在云盘里面分享一下，谢谢。

replies.author: 猜猜谁是谁
replies.txt_content:
目前你所要的DayM2.3.3还在制作中，作者的原话是这样的
Can I play the mod DayM; Afterlife right now?
No.
Is the mod coming back?
Yes. ( As of sometime in early 2016. )
Will there be a closed beta?
Most likely yes, it will probably be held around July.
Will I be in the closed beta?
That is completely up to /u/HaxMan12 & whoever he chooses to decide with. There is no guarantee that you or your dog will be in the closed beta.
When will it be released?
We estimate around 3-4 months for an open beta ( around September. )
意思差不多是

我可以玩mod daym来世吗？
否
是国防部回来？
是（如在2016年初的某个时候。）
会有内测？
最有可能的是，它可能会在七月举行。
我将在内测？
这完全取决于/ U / haxman12&无论他选择来决定。有没有保证，你或你的狗将在内测。
它将在什么时候发布？
我们估计在3-4个月的公测（九月左右。）
话说你还真是不依不饶啊= =
